title: Purdue to break ground on $8.8 million Centaur Equine Diagnostic and Surgical Center (Purdue University) ...
text: ( Source : Purdue University ) WEST LAFAYETTE, Ind. - Purdue University on Tuesday (Oct. 20) will break ground for the $8.8 million Centaur Equine Diagnostic and Surgical Center , located in Shelbyville near Indiana Grand Racing and Casino . The
